TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNamespaceResolver

summary.span: 描述服務，這項服務可以傳回以 XAML 標記中對應的前置詞為基礎的 XAML 命名空間。

span.span: Describes a service that can return a XAML namespace that is based on its prefix as it is mapped in XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型轉換器和標記延伸可以查詢為 XAML 物件寫入器叫用的值轉換行為時，會將 XAML 物件寫入器中，所提供的服務內容上的服務。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)並[Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 此介面也會實作為 WPF XAML 實作中一部分類別。This interface is also implemented as part of the WPF XAML implementation in the class. 儲存 XAML 命名空間資訊，以及與 XAML 處理器，這些資訊，以便透過相同的服務內容轉送給互動介面。 stores XAML namespace information and interacts with XAML processors to forward that information to the service context through the same interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetNamespace(string prefix) cil managed
Public Function GetNamespace (prefix As String) As String

param.name: prefix
param.span: 要擷取 XAML 命名空間資訊的前置詞。

span.span: The prefix for which to retrieve the XAML namespace information.

summary.span: 針對指定的前置字串擷取 XAML 命名空間識別項。

span.span: Retrieves a XAML namespace identifier for the specified prefix string.

returns.span: 所要求的 XAML 命名空間識別項 (字串形式)。

span.span: The requested XAML namespace identifier, as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration> GetNamespacePrefixes() cil managed
Public Function GetNamespacePrefixes () As IEnumerable(Of NamespaceDeclaration)

summary.span: 傳回作用中 XAML 結構描述內容中所有可能的前置詞對 XAML 命名空間對應 ( 值)。

span.span: Returns all the possible prefix-to-XAML namespace mappings ( values) that are available in the active XAML schema context.

returns.span: 若要取得所有前置字串，請從傳回之集合中的每個值取得 值。

span.span: To get all the prefix strings, get the value from each value in the returned set.

returns.span: 若要取得特定 XAML 命名空間的前置詞，請處理任何具有所需 值的傳回值。

span.span: To get prefixes for specific XAML namespaces, process any return value that has the desired value.
